page.title: 14A day in the life of Andrew
page.content: I get up at 7.00am, I wake up by myself.I then get myself dressed for school,I wear grey trousers, black shoes, coloured socks,a vest, a white shirt and a grey jumper.I go down to breakfast at 7.20 and eat my cereals. After this I go back upstairs and clean my teeth.We leave for school at 8.30. At Chelsfield Primary there are three classes; I am in class 3.After 8.55 we go into our classes and my teacher calls the register and I start my handwriting and other lessons. At 10.10 we all go into assembly and talk about things around us. After this we have a short break before starting lessons again, I play marbles.At 12.00 it is lunchtime. I have a hot dog, crisps, tea and biscuits.For the rest of the afternoon we work or have P.E. When I get home I practice my guitar, have tea and go to bed at 8.00pm.
